data.text: @byrr83 We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your travel experience with us! We look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon. -Nicole
Raise your hand if you're a fan of nonstop flights! 🙋 https://t.co/0bgYzjy8Rt

@grasshopperesq Hi there! Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. A member of our team will be happy to look into it with you ASAP. - C

urls.title: Passengers with Special Needs | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Allegiant is committed to providing passengers with special needs safe and comfortable travel. Learn more about procedures and approved devices for special needs passengers.

data.text: @JChuck31 Hi Janelle! Thanks for reaching out. For this, we kindly ask that you direct your communication to our ACAA Department. For contact information, please see here: https://t.co/MM3eUozSmz - C

data.text: @amber__ig__ Hi Amber! Thanks for reaching out with this question. Government issued ID is required to travel. If you do not have a driver's license or state issued ID, a copy of your birth certificate would be acceptable. If you have other questions, send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@GerardiAviation Thanks for sharing such beauty! 😍😍😍 - GM
@xOMFGxAxGirlx Hi Holly! Flight cancellations are happen on a case-by-case basis. - GM

@kassshhhh__ Hi there! We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. For cancellations, vouchers will be issued.

If you need additional assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

data.text: @karene_runs Hi Karen! We recommend accessing our official website from a desktop or laptop computer and using Google Chrome for the web browser, to avoid any possible compatibility issues. If you need further assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@chinmay_95 Thanks so much for bringing this to our attention!

Please be aware that our only official website is: https://t.co/HH4XDGQ907

@Gpinkdistrict We're so sorry to hear that you missed your flight. You cannot make changes to a flight once you have missed it. You may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC if you have additional questions or concerns. - C
@LMShamblin Hi Lisa! Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@ZeldaUCF1985 Hi Matt! We're so sorry for any disappointment. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@TammyP_67 Hey Tammy! All routes are current up until mid-November 2021. If a date is not shown in bold after selecting your desired origin and destination, then we are not offering a flight for your route and/or date of interest. -JH

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @coolstorymonica We're very sorry to hear this. Please fill out the following form for assistance. https://t.co/pRy6k7IsSK. -JH
@LoganT1997 Great suggestion! We'll be sure to submit your request for consideration. -JH
@lalalaurenlover Hey Lauren. Once checked in, you are unfortunately unable to modify your reservation. -JH

@jmsl32242158 We're sorry to learn of your recent travel experience. All passengers are required to wear a face mask over their mouth & nose at all times when traveling (except to briefly remove to for the consumption of food/beverages). Our team members are expected to enforce this policy. -J

@ChristySaidIt Hi Christy! Our ticket counters will open two hours prior to the estimated time of departure, but not before then. If you have questions or concerns that we can address for you, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

data.text: @IngridMinor Hi Ingrid! Credit vouchers (CR) can be applied online as a form of payment at check out. Look for ’Apply an Allegiant Voucher’ on the payment page. Enter your voucher number and click ‘Apply Voucher.’ Plz send a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC if you have additional questions. - C

data.text: @GreatWideTravel Hi Michelle! You are welcome to bring one stroller, a pack ‘n play, and one child safety seat (car seat or booster seat) at no additional cost. 😁 - GM
@candodem Hi there! That route will be on hiatus until further notice, we apologize for the inconvenience. - GM
@berricre8v Hi Amy! We're so sorry to hear that. So we may best assist you, please send us a DM with your details. We look forward to hearing from you. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

Marvalyn might work part-time on our Customer Care team, but there's nothing part-time about her commitment to providing the best customer service. In fact, she was recognized with a 2021 Customer Service Excellence Award from the @lvchamber. 

Congrats on a well-deserved honor! https://t.co/c9fH92KWTw
@thogge We see you sent us a DM. We will be with you momentarily. - GM

@cheryl_grams Hi Cheryl! We do not require proof of a COVID-19 vaccine to travel. To review a comprehensive list of our current safety measures, check out: https://t.co/hnFsp3MQby
If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

data.text: @pao_pavita Hi there! Our records indicate that we are currently assisting you via FB Messenger. We will continue with you there to avoid confusion. - C

@BallardRyan Hi Ryan! If you are experiencing issues with our mobile app, we recommend deleting the app and then ensuring your mobile device is currently updated before downloading the app again. If you continue to experience issues, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@jladner1978 Hi Joseph! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 at (702) 505-8888. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a representative over the phone, as we continue to receive an unprecedented number of calls each day. You can also send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@BobbyWhitneyMe1 Hi Bobby! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 at (702) 505-8888. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a representative over the phone, as we continue to receive an unprecedented number of calls each day. You can also send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@97_sports Hi there! We're sorry to hear about this. Was it TSA that confiscated this item from you when you were passing through the security checkpoint? If not, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the details of your experience. - C

data.text: @GerardiAviation What an absolutely beautiful photo! We would love to share this back to our followers. Reply #YesAllegiant to give us permission to use it for marketing purposes. Full T&C --> https://t.co/wzukGZ3ddj
@ReaganDGriffin If you need assistance, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@frecklemeadow Hi Ashley! Thanks for reaching out. There is no need to hold for this. You can add a bag to your reservation by going under "Manage Travel" on our official website. If you need further assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@Tymiller1127 Hi Tyler! Thanks so much for bringing this to our attention. If you are willing to provide your reservation details so that we may look into this further, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@toriinks Hi there Tori! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the details of your request. - C
@tmotteson Thank you for the wonderful feedback, you're the BEST! -JH 🙌 🙌
@RichSaiers We are sorry to hear that you have not been able to contact is. If in need of assistance, you can always send us a PM. -JH
@GerardiAviation 🧡 💙 🙌 -JH
@Imshortwtf Hi, thanks for reaching out. Please send us a DM and we'd be happy to assist further.-JH

Today and every day, we extend our heartfelt thanks to our team members for their steadfast dedication and commitment to delivering safe, reliable service to our customers. Happy Employee Appreciation Day! #TogetherWeFly #AllegiantProud https://t.co/ezNagK4mlJ
@nathantran94 Awesome. Looking forward to your response. -JH
@nathantran94 Hey Bao! If you are in need of assistance with a specific reservation. Please send us a PM so that a member of our team can review your flight details. -JH
@courtney_rose25 Sorry to hear that your flight was canceled! Please feel free to send us a private message so one of our team members can assist you! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@StephanieWatki5 We can't wait to welcome you on board! See you soon! 😎✈ - SG
@FlyEVV Two of our absolute favorites! You can't go wrong with sun and sand! 🏖 - SG
@PuffyMagu Thank you for letting us know, we will be sure to forward this along for an investigation. - GM

@andylutz3 Hi Andy, we are very sorry for the wait times you experienced. Please feel free to send us a DM with your 6-digit confirmation number and the email address on file if you are still in need of assistance. -Nicole

@Psquare92737958 If you still need assistance, please feel free to send us a private message and one of our team members will be happy to help. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@PortiaSogg Hi Portia! We're sorry to hear about this disruption in service. If you are seeking assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and a member of our team will be happy to review your options with you. - C
@Dan_Welter Hi Dan! Check your DMs 🙂 - C

@EmmaVoller Hi Emma! Email responses can take 4 to 6 weeks. If you need immediate assistance, please either send us a direct message, give us a call, or send us a chat online. We hope to hear from you real soon! - GM
